title: After an upgrade to 24.1, billing data collection fails for AWS
content:
After you perform a multi-hop upgrade to 24.1 from 2023.05 or earlier (2023.05 > 23.4 > 24.1), billing data collection fails for AWS integrations.

Cause

This issue occurs because of schema changes in both 23.4 and 24.1. In order for the schema to be updated and data collection to continue to work correctly, data collection must have successfully completed at least twice in 23.4.

Solution

Please contact the support team atÂ Support and services.
